StatDef.label: raw meat nutrition multiplier
StatDef.description: A multiplier on how nutritious raw meat is for this person. Note that since meals usually have more nutrition than their raw ingredients, a boost to this stat may only mean the person gets the same nutrition from raw food as if it were cooked.

StatDef.label: raw animal product nutrition multiplier
StatDef.description: A multiplier on how nutritious raw animal products are for this person. Note that since meals usually have more nutrition than their raw ingredients, a boost to this stat may only mean the person gets the same nutrition from raw food as if it were cooked.

StatDef.label: raw plant nutrition multiplier
StatDef.description: A multiplier on how nutritious raw plant-based food is for this person. Note that since meals usually have more nutrition than their raw ingredients, a boost to this stat may only mean the person gets the same nutrition from raw food as if it were cooked.

StatDef.label: cooked meat nutrition multiplier
StatDef.description: A multiplier on how nutritious cooked meat is for this person.

StatDef.label: cooked meat nutrition multiplier
StatDef.description: A multiplier on how nutritious cooked animal products are for this person.

StatDef.label: cooked plant nutrition multiplier
StatDef.description: A multiplier on how nutritious cooked plant-based food is for this person.
